remarks: The base set of the division ring on trace-preserving endomorphisms is the set of all trace-preserving endomorphisms (for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` ).  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
erngset.h-r $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
erngset.t-r $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.e-r $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
erngset.d-r $e |- D = ( ( EDRingR ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng.c-r $e |- C = ( Base ` D ) $.
erngbase-rN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> C = E ) $.
